quotes.message: What do you need to start a business? Three simple things: know your product better than anyone, know your customer, and have a burning desire to succeed.
quotes.name: Dave Thomas

quotes.message: A good idea for a new business tends not to occur in isolation, and often the window of opportunity is very small. So speed is of the essence.
quotes.name: Richard Branson

quotes.message: When you are starting a new business you don't want to go after giant markets. You want to go after small markets and take over those markets quickly.
quotes.name: Peter Thiel

quotes.message: What we are trying to do is to create a new business paradigm, simply showing that business can have a human face and a social conscience.
quotes.name: Anita Roddick

quotes.message: When starting a new business, people get blinders on. They have an idea, they stick to the idea, but they don't test it or check with their potential audience to see if this is a good idea. It happens all the time. Talk to your customers, see what they like and what you can change or not change.
quotes.name: JJ Ramberg

quotes.message: To every trend there is a counter-trend.
quotes.name: Patrick Dixon

quotes.message: There's a tremendous move toward green sustainability. There are going to be tremendous new business opportunities.
quotes.name: James Canton

quotes.message: The time to go into a new business is when it's badly run by others.
quotes.name: Richard Branson

quotes.message: Winning new business is the way that we create and sustain jobs going forward.
quotes.name: Charles Bickers

quotes.message: Retaining existing business is just as important as recruiting new business.
quotes.name: Mark Swanger

quotes.message: Digital technology is changing the face of entertainment, which is helping to transform peoples' lifestyles and create exciting new business opportunities.
quotes.name: Paul Otellini

quotes.message: Almost everything worthwhile carries with it some sort of risk, whether it's starting a new business, whether it's leaving home, whether it's getting married, or whether it's flying in space.
quotes.name: Chris Hadfield
